voice acting copyright", "Cloud Act \u2013 Improve law enforcement access to data stored across borders", "A Practical Introduction to Blockchain with Python", "Astronaut\u2019s DNA No Longer Matches C: extension to C that adds static and dynamic checking", "Touched (2015)", "Introduction to Recurrent Neural Networks in Pytorch", "First Detection of the 21cm Cosmic Dawn Signal", "A brief history of Stephen Hawking: A legacy of paradox", "Brainless Embryos Suggest Bioelectricity Guides Growth", "SRI confirms nuclear fusion startup's reactors are producing excess energy", "Don\u2019t Mess with the Birds", "How Leo and Gertrude Stein Revolutionized the Art World", "The Doctor and the Deadly House Call", "Zendar is hiring a Research Engineer"], "half_pie": false, "no_prefix": false, "height":
